bibl.title: P27 (Papyrus Oxyrhynchus 1355). A Fresh Analysis.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XI, 1355 (= van Haelst 498; LDAB 3010). - Introduction. - 1. Transcription of the text. - 2. The Physical and Palaeographical Characteristics of P27. - 3. The Textual Problems of P27. - Conclusion. - Appendix 1: Colour Images of P27 (Recto and Verso). - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism

bibl.seg: Samuli Siikavirta, P27 (Papyrus Oxyrhynchus 1355). A Fresh Analysis.
TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism 18 (2013) 10 pp., 1 fig. coul.

P. Oxy. XI, 1355 (= van Haelst 498; LDAB 3010). - Introduction. - 1. Transcription of the text. - 2. The Physical and Palaeographical Characteristics of P27. - 3. The Textual Problems of P27. - Conclusion. - Appendix 1: Colour Images of P27 (Recto and Verso). - Avec résumé en anglais.
